SEARCH

Package com.paradegame.ai

package com.paradegame.ai
This package contains classes related to the AI logic of the game, including how different AI players choose cards to play and discard cards.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.paradegame
     
    com.paradegame.controller
    This package contains the GameController Class which is responsible for controlling the game flow.
    com.paradegame.model
    This package contains the core game model classes, including Card, Colour, Deck, GameState, Parade and Player which define the fundamental components of the game.
    com.paradegame.util
    This package contains the Config class that loads game properties for the Parade game.
    com.paradegame.view
    This package contains classes responsible for the user interface, including CardDisplayer, ConsoleView, and InputHandler which manage card presentation, game state display and user input handling.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AIPlayer
    The AIPlayer class represents an computer-controlled player in the game.
    EasyAI
    An Easy Version of AI player that chooses cards to play and discard based on basic strategies.
    HardAI
    A Hard Version of AI player that chooses cards to play and discards based on complex strategies.
    MediumAI
    A Medium Version of AI player that selects cards to play and discard with a moderately strategic approach.
